mapper.update:
update PDM_VOUCHER
MARKET_ID = #{marketId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SALES_ORG_ID = #{salesOrgId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
VOUCHER_CODE = #{voucherCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ENABLED_FLAG = #{enabledFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
START_ACTIVE_DATE = #{startActiveDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
END_ACTIVE_DATE = #{endActiveDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CATEGORY = #{category,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QUANTITY = #{quantity,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MAX_USE_QTY = #{maxUseQty,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APP_SCOPE = #{appScope,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USAGE_MODE = #{usageMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APPLY_CRITERIA = #{applyCriteria,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ITEM_QUANTITY = #{itemQuantity,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
GIFT_QUANTITY = #{giftQuantity,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
APP_TAX = #{appTax,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPERATION = #{operation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_AMOUNT = #{orderAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
USE_CRITERIA = #{useCriteria,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DISCOUNT_TYPE = #{discountType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DISCOUNT_VALUE = #{discountValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER = OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER + 1,
REQUEST_ID = #{requestId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PROGRAM_ID = #{programId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATION_DATE = #{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATED_BY = #{createdBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LAST_UPDATED_BY = #{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LAST_UPDATE_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
LAST_UPDATE_LOGIN = #{lastUpdateLogin,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ATTRIBUTE_CATEGORY = #{attributeCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE1 = #{attribute1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE2 = #{attribute2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE3 = #{attribute3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE4 = #{attribute4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE5 = #{attribute5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE6 = #{attribute6,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE7 = #{attribute7,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE8 = #{attribute8,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE9 = #{attribute9,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE10 = #{attribute10,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE11 = #{attribute11,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE12 = #{attribute12,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE13 = #{attribute13,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE14 = #{attribute14,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE15 = #{attribute15,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where VOUCHER_ID = #{voucherId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ENABLED_FLAG = #{enabledFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, START_ACTIVE_DATE = #{startActiveDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, END_ACTIVE_DATE = #{voucherId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select from PDM_VOUCHER p where p.VOUCHER_CODE = #{voucherCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and p.ENABLED_FLAG = 'Y' and p.START_ACTIVE_DATE <= CURRENT_TIMESTAMP and p.END_ACTIVE_DATE >= CURRENT_TIMESTAMP

select from PDM_VOUCHER p
p.ENABLED_FLAG = 'Y' and p.START_ACTIVE_DATE <= CURRENT_TIMESTAMP and (p.END_ACTIVE_DATE >= CURRENT_TIMESTAMP OR p.END_ACTIVE_DATE IS NULL)
and VOUCHER_ID = #{voucherId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} for update

SELECT v.VOUCHER_ID,v.MARKET_ID,v.SALES_ORG_ID,v.VOUCHER_CODE, v.NAME,v.DESCRIPTION,v.ENABLED_FLAG,v.START_ACTIVE_DATE,v.END_ACTIVE_DATE, v.CATEGORY,v.TYPE,va.QUANTITY,v.MAX_USE_QTY,v.STATUS,v.APP_SCOPE, v.USAGE_MODE,v.APPLY_CRITERIA,v.ITEM_QUANTITY,v.GIFT_QUANTITY, v.APP_TAX,v.OPERATION,v.ORDER_AMOUNT,v.USE_CRITERIA,v.DISCOUNT_TYPE, v.DISCOUNT_VALUE,vi.QUANTITY as V_QUANTITY,vi.ITEM_ID,vi.VOUCHER_ITEM_ID FROM (PDM_VOUCHER v LEFT OUTER JOIN PDM_VOUCHER_ITEM vi ON(VI.VOUCHER_ID=v.VOUCHER_ID)) LEFT OUTER JOIN PDM_VOUCHER_ASSIGN va ON(va.VOUCHER_ID=v.VOUCHER_ID)
v.ENABLED_FLAG='Y' AND v.START_ACTIVE_DATE <= CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AND (v.END_ACTIVE_DATE>=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP OR v.END_ACTIVE_DATE IS NULL) AND ((va.SALES_ORG_ID=#{salesOrgId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND va.ASSIGN_TYPE='SALES')
OR (va.MEMBER_ID=#{memberId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND va.ASSIGN_TYPE='MEM')
) AND va.QUANTITY>0 AND v.CATEGORY != 'VIP'

SELECT v.VOUCHER_ID,v.MARKET_ID,v.SALES_ORG_ID,v.VOUCHER_CODE, v.NAME,v.DESCRIPTION,v.ENABLED_FLAG,v.START_ACTIVE_DATE,v.END_ACTIVE_DATE, v.CATEGORY,v.TYPE,va.QUANTITY,v.MAX_USE_QTY,v.STATUS,v.APP_SCOPE, v.USAGE_MODE,v.APPLY_CRITERIA,v.ITEM_QUANTITY,v.GIFT_QUANTITY, v.APP_TAX,v.OPERATION,v.ORDER_AMOUNT,v.USE_CRITERIA,v.DISCOUNT_TYPE, v.DISCOUNT_VALUE,vi.QUANTITY as V_QUANTITY,vi.ITEM_ID,vi.VOUCHER_ITEM_ID FROM (PDM_VOUCHER v LEFT OUTER JOIN PDM_VOUCHER_ITEM vi ON(VI.VOUCHER_ID=v.VOUCHER_ID)) LEFT OUTER JOIN PDM_VOUCHER_ASSIGN va ON(va.VOUCHER_ID=v.VOUCHER_ID)
v.ENABLED_FLAG='Y' AND v.START_ACTIVE_DATE <= CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AND (v.END_ACTIVE_DATE>=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP OR v.END_ACTIVE_DATE IS NULL) AND ((va.SALES_ORG_ID=#{request.salesOrgId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND va.ASSIGN_TYPE='SALES')
OR (va.MEMBER_ID=#{memberId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND va.ASSIGN_TYPE='MEM')
) AND va.QUANTITY > 0 AND v.STATUS = 'RELD' AND v.CATEGORY = 'VIP' AND not exists (select oso.order_status from om_sales_order oso, om_mws_order_payment op where oso.header_id = op.order_header_id and op.payment_method='ECUP' AND OP.VOUCHER_ID=V.VOUCHER_ID AND OP.STATUS='NEW' and oso.order_status in ('WPAY', 'PAYIN', 'COMP'))
mapper.sql: VOUCHER_ID, MARKET_ID, SALES_ORG_ID, VOUCHER_CODE, NAME, DESCRIPTION, ENABLED_FLAG, START_ACTIVE_DATE, END_ACTIVE_DATE, CATEGORY, TYPE, QUANTITY, MAX_USE_QTY, STATUS, APP_SCOPE, USAGE_MODE, APPLY_CRITERIA, ITEM_QUANTITY, GIFT_QUANTITY, APP_TAX, OPERATION, ORDER_AMOUNT, USE_CRITERIA, DISCOUNT_TYPE, DISCOUNT_VALUE, OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER, REQUEST_ID, PROGRAM_ID, CREATION_DATE, CREATED_BY, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATE_DATE, LAST_UPDATE_LOGIN, ATTRIBUTE_CATEGORY, ATTRIBUTE1, ATTRIBUTE2, ATTRIBUTE3, ATTRIBUTE4, ATTRIBUTE5, ATTRIBUTE6, ATTRIBUTE7, ATTRIBUTE8, ATTRIBUTE9, ATTRIBUTE10, ATTRIBUTE11, ATTRIBUTE12, ATTRIBUTE13, ATTRIBUTE14, ATTRIBUTE15, SOURCE_ORDER_ID,MARKET_CODE,MEMBER_CODE,ORDER_NUMBER
mapper.select: update pdm_voucher pv set pv.enabled_flag = 'N' where trunc(pv.end_active_date, 'mi') < sysdate
